amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title II of division C, relating to oil and gas development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 108-69 strikes Title II of Division C, relating to oil and gas development provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 251 (Roll no. 142).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Kind.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
